items.summary: Update the username generation function in backend/main.mo to produce 8-character alphanumeric usernames using both uppercase and lowercase letters mixed with numbers (e.g., 'A3x7K9m2', 'B5n2M8k1'). Keep all existing username generation logic and behavior intact - only change the format/presentation of the output.

Update all frontend components that display usernames (MessageBubble, Header, etc.) to render the new 8-character alphanumeric format. Ensure the display matches the backend format without modification.
